channel.title: Archlinux on Knowledge base
channel.description: Recent content in Archlinux on Knowledge base

item.title: Installation
item.description: Keyboard layout loadkey fr-latin1Wifi setup iwctl station wlan0 scan station wlan0 get-networks station wlan0 connect ${SSID}Disk EFI Partition Command (m for help): n Partition number: <Press Enter> First sector: <Press Enter> Last sector, +/-sectors or +/-size{K,M,G,T,P}: +100M Command (m for help): t Partition type or alias (type L to list all): uefiBoot Partition Command (m for help): n Partition number: <Press Enter> First sector: <Press Enter> Last sector, +/-sectors or +/-size{K,M,G,T,P}: +1024M Command (m for help): t Partition type or alias (type L to list all): linuxLUKS Partition Command (m for help): n Partition number: <Press Enter> First sector: <Press Enter> Last sector, +/-sectors or +/-size{K,M,G,T,P}: <Press Enter> Command (m for help): t Partition type or alias (type L to list all): linuxCheck partition table and write change Command (m for help): pCommand (m for help): wFormat EFI and Boot mkfs.
